summary:
### **Material Information Summary**  

#### **High-Grade Silver-Indium Drilling Results (Orient West, QLD)**  
- **Key Highlights:**  
  - Multiple high-grade intersections, including:  
    - **ORR082:** 1m @ 1,334.8 g/t Ag Eq. (153.6 g/t Ag, 568.3 g/t In, 2.94% Pb, 16.36% Zn)  
    - **ORR084:** 1m @ 1,478.3 g/t Ag Eq. (599 g/t Ag, 76.3 g/t In, 14.09% Pb, 6.85% Zn)  
    - **ORR078:** 45m @ 75.6 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. 1m @ 542.7 g/t Ag Eq.)  
    - **ORR080:** 86m @ 53.6 g/t Ag Eq. (shallow, open-pittable depths)  
- **Resource Development:**  
  - **Orient West JORC Infill Drilling** complete; assays pending for holes ORR086–ORR095.  
  - Initial **JORC Resource estimate** targeted for **end July 2025** (pending assays).  
  - **Orient East Drilling** underway; JORC Resource expected by **September 2025**.  
- **Exploration Target:**  
  - **Broad Target Range:** 74–100 Mt @ 55–65 g/t Ag Eq. (30 g/t cut-off).  
  - **High-Grade Core:** 20–24 Mt @ 110–120 g/t Ag Eq. (80 g/t cut-off).  

#### **Next Steps**  
- Further drilling planned to test **underground potential** at depth.  
- **VTEM Survey** data under review for additional targets.  

### **Capital Markets Implications**  
- Results support potential for scalable **open-pit + underground** operation.  
- Upcoming catalysts: **JORC Resource estimates** (West: July 2025; East: September 2025).  

**Format:** Concise, trading-relevant bullets; omit operational boilerplate.
